alert.note: Alert for Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 14 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHWESTERN KIT CARSON COUNTY THROUGH 415 PM MDT... At 345 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Flagler, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Kit Carson County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
